I Am Luca
   

Computer Science student, specializing in IOs and Web Development (Front and Back-end), training on Machine Learning and Data Analysis and with a strong preference for easy to use, intuitive UI/UX.

My work

About Me

Let me tell you a little about myself and what I do..

Hello, I am Luca Barone

I am a graduate student in Computer Science, at "Luigi Vanvitelli" University in Aversa, Italy. I am a creative developer with a knowledge of basic design concepts. Last year, after living abroad for more than one year between Spain and Japan, thanks to the Erasmus program, I joined the Apple Developer Academy. During the Nine months at the Academy, I achieved not only great skills in coding for iOS apps, but I also learned the principales of UI/UX Design and Business for product development as well as improved my soft skills. Currently, I am living in Barcelona after finishing my thesis research project on Deep Learning, where, while finishing my master degree, I am looking for new job opportinities. I would like to work in an international environment where I could keep improving my skills and knowledge and put at use my passion for languages, my soft skills and my engineering background.

My skills

Thanks to my experiences acquired during the Apple Developer Academy and my Erasmus in Malaga (Spain), Barcelona (Spain) and Nagasaki (Japan), I Gained international and intercultural competencies, improved my soft skills and I also learned or improved new languages.

Soft Skills

Working in different environment and with different people I developed the following Soft Skills:

Leadership, Teamwork,
Time-Managment, Adaptability and Problem-Solving.

Language Skills

Living abroad dramatically boosted my competences in foreign langauages:

Italian(Native), English(C1), Spanish(C1), Japanese(N3)

Design

My design process usually involves wireframing, a few mokups, and then create a prototype using Marvel, that, over several iterations, becomes the final design. I have experience with Adobe Creative Suite and with Sketch on MacOS. Thanks to a Game I developed alone, during the lockdown, I gained some experience in Game Design and Music Design.
